textBox.richText: At the closing stages of our Californian stay we decided to visit the well known tourist trap of the Kodak Theatre. For those unfamiliar, this is where the Academy Awards are held. The day we visited they’d forgotten to roll out the red carpet. I’ll have to get onto my publicist when I get home! Surrounding the theatre we found our favorite stars on the Walk of Fame, compared hands at Grauman’s Theatre and gazed at the Hollywood sign. Our next stop was the Grand Canyon. To reach our destination we were to catch the Amtrak operated Southwest Chief. The train trip was such a blast. We met a few friendly people during our comfortable ride. The only downside of the ride was being woken up at 4.20am as our train rolled into our destination of Flagstaff.
